TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider

Docs.summary: Provides a base class for design-time support for controls that derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Extend the DataBoundControlDesigner class if you want to create a designer for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> Web server control or for a class that extends <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the object for this designer.
Docs.value: The object associated with this designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disconnects events from the previous data source and connects them to the current data source.
Docs.returns: if the data-bound control connected to a new data source; if the data source did not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Invokes the standard dialog box to create a new data source control, and sets the new data source control's ID to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the data-bound control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to bind to the data source.
Docs.summary: Binds the object to the data source.
Gets the shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> property of the underlying data-bound control.
Docs.value: The shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> of the underlying data-bound control.

Docs.summary: Gets the designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.
Docs.value: The designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.

Docs.summary: Gets the object associated with the data source of this designer.
Docs.value: The object associated with the data source of this designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DisconnectFromDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disconnects the data-bound control from data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Dispose method unregisters the designer's event handlers from all data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the design-time data source from either the associated or the property.
Docs.returns: An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface referencing the design-time data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetSampleDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets dummy sample data to render the data-bound control on the design surface if sample data cannot be created from the or properties.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing dummy sample data used to render the data-bound control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object containing the properties to filter.
Docs.summary: Overridden by the designer to shadow run-time properties of the data-bound control with corresponding properties implemented by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override the PreFilterProperties method to perform any additional actions required when the data source of the underlying data-bound control changes.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.
Docs.value: The number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema%2A>.
Docs.value: if the designer can refresh the data source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.

Docs.returns: The selected data member from the selected data source, if the control allows the user to select an object (such as a object) for the data source, and provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> property to select a particular list (or object) within the data source.

Docs.returns: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control, or if a data source is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider> interface.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should include "Choose a data source" in its action list.
